props.description: The content displayed within the badge. This can be text, icons, or any other ReactNode.
props.title: children

props.description: Determines the visual style of the badge, influencing its color scheme and appearance.
props.title: appearance

props.description: Specifies the size of the badge, controlling its dimensions.
props.title: size

props.description: Defines the visual variant of the badge, affecting its background style.
props.title: variant
